cyclone.name: KAREN
cyclone.current_location: about 135 miles SSW of St. Croix
cyclone.trajectory: Turning north near the Virgin Islands then accelerating north-northeast into the western Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or over the Virgin Islands and eastern Puerto Rico

weather_observation.warning_coast: U.S. Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico (including Vieques and Culebra) and British Virgin Islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands, with heavy rain also possible in the northern Leeward Islands
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm-force winds (35–45 mph) with higher gusts are expected late tonight into Tuesday; strongest on windward slopes.
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches with localized amounts up to 8 inches could trigger flash flooding and mud-slides.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Flash flooding and rapid rises on small streams; minor power interruptions possible.
